data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Takydromus (Squamata: Lacertidae) from Tianjingshan Forestry Station, northern Guangdong, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Ying-Yong Wang Shi-Ping Gong Peng, Wang, Xin (2017): A new species of the genus Takydromus (Squamata: Lacertidae) from Tianjingshan Forestry Station, northern Guangdong, China. Zootaxa 4338 (3): 441-458, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.3.2
